sections.title: Overview
sections.content: Define pricing strategy, packaging, and monetization model with clear value ladders, guardrails, and billing operations.

sections.title: Tiers & Packaging
sections.content: Plan, Pro, Enterprise (example); feature gates, usage limits, seat vs usage pricing, add-ons; value communication.

sections.title: Monetization & Billing
sections.content: Billing cadence, metering sources of truth, proration, invoices/receipts, taxes/VAT, failures/dunning, currency support.

sections.title: Discounting & Promotions
sections.content: Eligibility rules, approval flows, promo codes, trials, coupons; guardrails to protect ARPU and margins.

sections.title: Upgrades/Downgrades & Trials
sections.content: Self-serve flows for plan changes and trials; data migrations; entitlements; contract and renewal terms.

sections.title: Compliance & Taxes
sections.content: Tax nexus, receipts, terms, PCI implications; auditability and revenue recognition notes.
